Brigades.multilineAlert: Multiline brigade, possible errors in matching vehicle schedules. Please use your own judgment to verify the correctness of the matches.

Favorites.howToAddStopsHere: To add a stop, click the star ⭐ on the stop.
Favorites.thanksToDirection: By selecting a direction, we'll show only departures in the chosen place.

Search.vehiclesDescription: Search using the fleet number (e.g., 5869), route (e.g., 105) or brigade (e.g., 105/1)
Search.stopsDescription: Search using the name, e.g., Main Station.
Search.routesDescription: Search using the route number, e.g., 105.
Search.relationsDescription: Search using the relation number, e.g., 99267.
Search.historyDescription: We save recent searches so you can quickly return to them.

Filter.howToUseContent: To filter vehicles on the map, select the lines or vehicle models you are interested in through the search input, then return to the map by clicking on it.

Sun.bestSide.direction: It's best to sit <bold>{{direction}}</bold> to the direction of travel.
Sun.bestSide.side: It's best to sit on the <bold>{{direction}}</bold> side of the vehicle.

Settings.moveToLastLocation: Use last location when opening the map
Settings.useLocationSorting: Sort stops according to your location
Settings.welcomeText: Select a city to see live public transport on map.

blogPosts.title: Blog
blogPosts.description: Read the latest posts on our blog dedicated to public transportation. Learn more about new features in the app, planned functionalities, and interesting facts related to public transport.

brigadeSchedule.title: Brigade schedule {{route}}/{{brigade}} in {{city}}
brigadeSchedule.description: Check the schedule of brigade {{brigade}} for route {{route}} in {{city}}. See all trips, travel times, and information about the vehicle operating the route.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Customize the app to your needs. Choose the language, change the app icon, and select the city you are currently in.

cities.title: Select city
cities.description: Check where your bus, tram, or train is in {{cities}}. See departures from stops, timetables, brigades, and vehicle information.

city.title: {{city}} - Public transport map
city.description: Track the real-time movement of buses, trams, and trains in {{city}}! By clicking on a vehicle or stop, get detailed information about the route and upcoming departures. Customize the map view by filtering according to the lines or vehicle models you are interested in to quickly and efficiently plan your journey.

route.title: {{city}} - Route {{route}} schedule
route.description: Check the schedule of route {{route}} in {{city}}. See all trips, travel times, brigade schedules, and information about the vehicle operating the route.

schedules.title: {{city}} - Timetables
schedules.description: Check the timetables of buses, trams, and trains in {{city}}. See departures from stops, brigade schedules, and vehicle information.

station.title: Station {{station}}
station.description: Check train departures from station {{station}}. Train delays, platform information, and train location on the map.

stop.title: Stop {{stop}} in {{city}}
stop.description: Check public transport departures from stop {{stop}} in {{city}}. Vehicle location on the map, departure information, and timetable.

trip.title: Trip of route {{route}} towards {{headsign}}
trip.description: Check the trip of route {{route}} towards {{headsign}}. See departures from stops, vehicle location on the map, and vehicle information.

Time.nextDay: You will see the schedule for the next day from {{time}}
